game.name: Guerilla Cubes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Guerilla Cubes is an action-packed couch co-op hero shooter where a special ops squad battles through living jungles, scorching deserts, and bone-freezing tundra's to reclaim Cube City from the ruthless BOX BOSS.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Guerilla Cubes is an action-packed couch co-op hero shooter where a special ops squad battles through living jungles, scorching deserts, and bone-freezing tundra's to reclaim Cube City from the ruthless BOX BOSS.
